What is AUTOSAR?

Sep 28, 2025

Here’s a simple blink example for STM32:

```c #include “stm32f4xx.h”

int main(void) { RCC->AHB1ENR |= RCC_AHB1ENR_GPIODEN; // Enable GPIOD GPIOD->MODER |= (1 « (12 * 2)); // Set PD12 to output

while (1) {
    GPIOD->ODR ^= (1 << 12);         // Toggle LED
    for (volatile int i = 0; i < 1000000; i++); // Delay
} }

theoritical, automotive
